author: mgrigorov
msg: WICKET-3263 Allow AjaxRequestTarget.IListeners to be Registered at the WebApplication Level
Make WebApplication#newAjaxRequestTarget() final and introduce IProvider for it and listeners (AjaxRequestTarget.IListener)
